subject: Re: [junit] Can we have multiple runs for a single test method of the Unit test case
msgSnippet: ... It would be an easy way to check a requirement like this random value needs to be between 12 and 20 by running the test 1000 times or something. It has
messageBody:
Eugene Kuleshov wrote:
> Cedric,
>
> What could be value of repeated test alone?
>
> In JUnit 3 I'm using RepeatedTest together with ActiveTestSuite to
> perform rudimentary concurrency testing, but that is about it.

It would be an easy way to check a requirement like "this random value
needs to be between 12 and 20" by running the test 1000 times or something.

It has been useful capturing a test for an "intermittent" defect.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
